generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings and traffic flowing in both directions.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right side of the road, adjacent to the building and bus stop.
- building: Multiple buildings line both sides of the street, including commercial and residential structures.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the street, particularly on the left side and in the distance.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast and gray.
- person: A few pedestrians can be seen on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road, including a silver car in the middle lane and a black SUV in the right lane.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at an intersection ahead, showing green.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including directional signs and a "H" sign indicating a bus stop.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- terrain: Some grassy areas are visible along the sidewalk and between the road and buildings.
